name: Ateet Khandelwal
about: As a Quantitative Analyst at OSTC, a global trading company, I apply my skills in Python, and programming to develop and implement quantitative models and strategies for various markets and asset classes. I have a Master of Technology dual degree from the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. I have over two years of work experience in the financial sector, including as an Analyst at Nomura, where I performed market risk management and reporting, and as a Quant Analyst Intern at Morningstar, where I worked on factor-based investment strategy implementation. I am passionate about applying data-driven and analytical approaches to solve complex problems and generate value for my clients and stakeholders. I am also eager to learn new skills and techniques and collaborate with diverse and talented teams.

experience.title: Head of Events
experience.description: 'Prakriti' - An Agri and Food Innovation Fest by the students of Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur, targets the amalgamation of academia and industry associated with the agricultural and food sector.Responsible for organizing various events during the three day fest, including workshops, student summit and several competitions.
